short_summary: Contractorer will be required to produce a corporate wide cyber strategy, one that isn’t limited to the CIO organization only.
description: Vol 6 Cyber Prot. Sev ics; The contractor will be required to produce a corporate wide cyber strategy, one that isn’t limited to the CIO organization only.  It is intended to be a description of how CMHC’s cyber related investments will be used across the enterprise to achieve business success. The resulting strategy must be explicitly linked to business outcomes, rather than internal activities, such as cost, project delivery or service levels, which are activities that are documented as part of the IT operational plan.   The contractor will be required to provide Strategic IT Security Planning and Protection Consultant service for a period of one year with option to extend for up to additional 2 years to total period of 3 years.
duration_in_months: This contract will last for 36 months.
